title: Riot Client Patcher has stopped working
body:
I was playing league yesterday on my laptop got on today to try and do the update and I got this error I have tried to reinstall but now it wont even open need assistance

Problem signature:
  Problem Event Name:	APPCRASH
  Application Name:	LoLLauncher.exe
  Application Version:	2.17.0.280
  Application Timestamp:	53f6a71c
  Fault Module Name:	HTTPHandler.dll
  Fault Module Version:	2.8.13.1
  Fault Module Timestamp:	4f33e386
  Exception Code:	c0000005
  Exception Offset:	0001243d
  OS Version:	6.1.7601.2.1.0.256.48
  Locale ID:	1033
  Additional Information 1:	0a9e
  Additional Information 2:	0a9e372d3b4ad19135b953a78882e789
  Additional Information 3:	0a9e
  Additional Information 4:	0a9e372d3b4ad19135b953a78882e789

Read our privacy statement online:
  http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=104288&clcid=0x0409

If the online privacy statement is not available, please read our privacy statement offline:
  C:\Windows\system32\en-US\erofflps.txt

replies.body: Yea so I have heard a little back from the league support place they are trying to work on a fix I will post what they email me as soon as I hear a response
Ok thanks. I really hope that I can play soon. Gotta ear enough IP for Azir xD

Hey I've been having the same problem. I try and open league, then the League of Legends logo shows up, closes, the new patcher logo with the grey bar appears loads, and then it says that Riot Client Patcher has stopped working. I've reinstalled, ran as admin, and forced a patch and it still hasn't worked. This problem is brand new to the 4.15 update and I'm guessing it has something to do with the new patcher. Any advice or fixes?
Edit: I'm running Windows 7

Server: NA
Type of Bug:Riot Client Patcher has stopped working
Description: Tried to do a fresh re-intstall of league but every time i do the below error occurs

Observed result: Fails every time

Processor	Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-2520M CPU @ 2.50GHz
Video Card	Intel(R) HD Graphics 3000
Memory	8.1 GB
Operating System	Microsoft Windows 7 Professional Edition Service Pack 1 (build 7601), 64-bit

I guess i'll join in here. Mine updated the patch but as soon as I hit "Launch" The screen disappears, my computer says it's still running but nothing happens.  I have tried repairing, re installing, ect, ect.  Nothing seems to work.
